#summary GetGame API documentation.

= GetGame API =

GetGame title search returns game data in an XML document. 

Parameters:

name (string): Alpha characters only, case insensitive, partial phrases excepted, no partial words.

example request:
`http://thegamesdb.net/api/GetGame.php?name=halo`

example result:
`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>

<Data>
<Game>
<id>1</id>
<GameTitle>Halo</GameTitle>
<ReleaseDate>3/10/2010</ReleaseDate>
<Overview>Here is an overview of this game.</Overview>
</Game>
<Game>
<id>2</id>
<GameTitle>Halo 2</GameTitle>

<ReleaseDate></ReleaseDate>
</Game>
<Game>
<id>3</id>
<GameTitle>Halo 3</GameTitle>
<ReleaseDate></ReleaseDate>
</Game>
</Data>`
